definitions: in an awkward and careless way

examples.text: he climbed clumsily over the rail
I reached over and fumbled clumsily until my finger found the button

definitions: in a way that lacks skill or finesse
shortDefinitions: in way which lacks skill or finesse

definitions: in a tactless way that shows a lack of social skills

examples.text: they clumsily said the wrong thing
some of the issues are handled clumsily

shortDefinitions: in tactless way that shows lack of social skills
